alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Hill; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 10:45AM CDT until May 05 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western McLennan County in central Texas... Eastern Bosque County in central Texas... Southwestern Hill County in central Texas... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1045 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Valley Mills, or 11 miles northwest of McGregor, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waco, Hillsboro, McGregor, Clifton, West, Whitney, Valley Mills, Crawford, Blum, Lake Whitney State Park, Gholson, Abbott and Aquilla. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 353 and 366. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
